componentMetadata.docblock: A form select with a label that can display error messages.

childrenComponentProp.name: errorMessage
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Error string to display in the component.
When defined, indicates select has a validation error.

childrenComponentProp.name: options
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Array of options to populate select.

childrenComponentProp.name: required
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Render marker indicating field is required.

childrenComponentProp.name: includeBlankOption
childrenComponentProp.docblock: is there an empty selectable thing

childrenComponentProp.name: emptyDescription
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Description that shows up for the blank option, when includeBlankOption is true

childrenComponentProp.name: value
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
`value` - object containing:
  - `value`: Value of the select field.
  - `dirty`: boolean. Whether a field has been touched by the user.

childrenComponentProp.name: additionalClass
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Additional css class that is added to the select element.
